name: Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Add all ingredients to a smoothie mixer

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Place cheese between bread and fry on each side until well melted and toasted
Optional: Add tomato to give more texture

name: Salmon Caesar Salad
instructions: Chop lettuce into a bowl and add the caesar dressing
Cook your salmon with your preferred method (Stovetop, Grill, Air Fry)
Place your salmon on top of the salad

name: Fruit Salad
instructions: Chop all of your fruit up into a bowl and mix well
